title: US Strikes ISIS in Cooperation With Nigeria
description: The US launched a military strike against Islamic State targets in Nigeria in a security and intelligence collaboration with the African nation’s government. President Donald Trump said he directed American forces to carry out “a powerful and deadly strike” against ISIS. Laura Davison reports on Bloomberg Television. (Source: Bloomberg)
